thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com | 5 of 257
thread.title: Jason

author: Jason
title: Jason
text: All in all very satisfied with the entire process and the quality/condition of the trees when I received my order. My only recommendation would be to provide more planting information for each variety of tree or bush sold. For example I bought multiple apple trees and would have like to see more information on spacing when planting in rows. Also, on trees that need a pollinator, more info on recommended pollinators to pair with that variety. Just recommendations for novices such as myself.
